title: Reportes online con Quarto
text:
Quarto
Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see:
https://quarto.org
https://openscapes.github.io/quarto-website-tutorial/

title: Reportes online con Quarto
text:
Running Code
When you click the Render button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

dat %>% head

  year month julian       date tmax tmin rain hr
1 1971     1      1 1971-01-01 29.6  5.4  0.0 54
2 1971     1      2 1971-01-02 32.2 16.4  0.0 47
3 1971     1      3 1971-01-03 30.6 14.4  7.4 59
4 1971     1      4 1971-01-04 25.2 12.8  0.0 63
5 1971     1      5 1971-01-05 30.4  8.2  0.0 48
6 1971     1      6 1971-01-06 24.8 15.4  0.0 69







The echo: false option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
This extension allows you to use font-awesome icons in your Quarto HTML and PDF documents. It provides an {{< fa >}} shortcode:

Mandatory <icon-name>:
{{< fa <icon-name> >}}
Optional <group>, <size=...>, and <title=...>:
{{< fa <group> <icon-name> <size=...> <title=...> >}}

For example:







Shortcode
Icon




{{< fa thumbs-up >}}



{{< fa folder >}}



{{< fa chess-pawn >}}



{{< fa brands bluetooth >}}



{{< fa brands twitter size=2xl >}} (HTML only)



{{< fa brands github size=5x >}} (HTML only)



{{< fa battery-half size=Huge >}}



{{< fa envelope title="An envelope" >}}
